snippet: Having fun with, and maybe even making sense of, the Iowa caucuses.
abstract: Having fun with, and maybe even making sense of, the Iowa caucuses.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES - There is always something a little peculiar about coming to Iowa for its quadrennial day of fame, but this time it was particularly disconcerting for me to land in an otherwise unremarkable Midwestern city for its first-in-the-season presidential nominating contest.

headline.main: Back in Iowa, With the Usual Fuss
